sections.Biography:
==="[[The Lost Lords]]"===
Lucan first appears when [[Mira Forrester]] attempts to sneak into the gardens at midnight to meet with an unknown person who left a note in her room. Lucan spots her and demands that she returns to her chambers. However, [[Damien]] then arrives and assures LucanÂ that Mira is with him, and Lucan begrudgingly allows her to stay. 

LucanÂ is later seen searching for Damien after he attacks Mira and is either killed or left with [[Tom (Telltale)|Tom]].

==="[[The Sword in the Darkness]]"===
At the [[Purple Wedding|royal wedding]], Lucan is on guard duty when he again encounters Mira with [[Sera Flowers]]. He demands to know what she was doing with Damien in the garden and tries to detain her, but he is prevented by [[Morgryn|Lord Morgryn]], who intentionally bumps into him and spills wine over his clothes. Morgryn then requests Mira's help to Lucan's initial refusal, until Morgryn reminds him of their different social statuses. Lucan then reluctantly leaves Mira and returns to his watch.
